name: Topple Tower
description:
Topple Tower is a short puzzle adventure, made for Ludum Dare 47 with the theme "Stuck in a Loop".

Climb a teetering tower to help a buddy out! Looks like an easy puzzle game, but you'll find yourself stuck in a loop if you don't think outside the box.

Click here to listen to the extended soundtrack!
https://nhsynthonicorchestra.bandcamp.com/album/topple-tower-original-game-jam-soundtrack

Created by: Ririnish
Composer: Nathan Hanover
Animator: Tatanish
